name: 行動文學：說故事的藝術及其應用
restrict: ◎限大二大三大四 ◎限碩一碩二碩三以上修習
goals: Offer individual perspective with critical thinking in analyzing different works.
Develop practical skills to explore storytelling methodology (point of view, emotional engagement, dramatic action, reading out loud, body language, facial expression, etc.)
Understand the ways to effectively apply storytelling to their daily communication.
Choose appropriate virtual media as a delivery option for story-based presentation.
syllabus:
Week 1            OrientationMeeting

General Introduction to Storytelling

Week 2            WhatIs Storytelling

Week 3            BasicApproaches to Storytelling

Storytelling and the Video/Audio Technology

Week 4            Video-enabledstorytelling

Week 5            Audio-enabledstorytelling

Week 6            Image-enabledstorytelling

Week 7            SilentVideo-enabled storytelling

Week 8            Presentation

Storytelling and the Virtual Technology

Week 9           Storytellingand the Internet

Week 10         DevelopingVirtual Storytellers

Week 11          Storytellingon Mobile Phones

Week 12          Participantsand Spectators in Interactive Narrative

Week 13          Presentation

Storytelling and the Business World

Week 14          Mythand the Narrative of Legendary Brands

Week 15          LegendaryBrands and Personal Narrative

Week 16          CraftingBrand Narrative

Week 17          CommunicatingBrand Narrative

Week 18          Presentation

methodologies.note: A short lecture to introduce students the basic skills to present storytelling
Potential problems provided by the instructors for students to develop into plausible topics for their project
